uk.ac.nottingham.group27atosproject.helperclasses

Class ClientThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • uk.ac.nottingham.group27atosproject.helperclasses.ClientThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ClientThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Class that extends Thread and runs the TCP IP client. On change updates the UI using Handler.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClientThread

        public ClientThread(android.os.Handler UIHandler,
                    NavigationActivity navigationActivity,
                    android.widget.TextView textView,
                    java.lang.String messageToServer)
        Constructor. Sets all member variables. Also loads the IP address preference using the PreferenceManager.
        Parameters:
        UIHandler - needs a Handler to change the UI from a worker thread
        navigationActivity - NavigationActivity
        textView - UI TextView component to update from this ClientThread
        messageToServer - message that is sent to the server

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        *

        Connects to server every second and fetches the data. The data is used to update the UI.

        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • connect

        private java.lang.String connect()
        Does the actual TCP IP Client Server connection. Returns String received from server. Can return null when no data received.
        Returns:
        fetched string from server

      • stopRunning

        public void stopRunning()
        Stop running the client.
